statements: DELETE FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE system_id = 101 AND total_usage_hours > 500;
DELETE FROM maintenance_planning_and_optimization WHERE completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems WHERE surgeon_id = 101 AND operation_date < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_planning_and_optimization WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' AND cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics' AND production_year < 2015;
DELETE FROM Usage_Statistics WHERE surgeon_id = 25 AND robot_model_id = 5;
